Class Meteor

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Model.AdventureCard.Meteor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Meteor extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a meteor object in the game. The Meteor class models a meteor's size and the direction it is coming from, encapsulated in the Orientation enum. A meteor can either be "BIG" or "SMALL" and can originate from one of the four orientations: TOP, BOTTOM, LEFT, or RIGHT. The class provides functionality for retrieving its size and orientation.
See Also:
